root.store: Берлиндегі Бранденбург ғылым академиясында (Berlin-Brandenburgischen Akademie der Wissenschaften) сақтаулы.
root.general: The fragment is a well-preserved double page of the book. The distance between text columns is 2.6 cm. Probably, this fragment belongs to U 172 (Wilkens, №585) and to U 179 (Wilkens, №590) too.
root.description: Manuscript: Old Turkic. Paper: tan, soft. Quantity of lines: part I: on both sides 11 lines in each and 1 heading; part II: on both sides 12 lines in each and 1 heading. Designations: between the part I (front) and part II (back): Т.М. 342 (pencil); the stickers U5 and ТМ 342 are pasted on the left top corner. Characteristics: Colon marks are outlined in red.
root.size: Distance between lines: 1.0 cm; however, between lines 3 and 4: 0,8 cm; between heading and the first line: 1.5 cm. 14.8 cm (height) x 22 cm (width).
root.investigation: L.Clark 422 claims that this fragment is a part of the manuscript of the story “Mentions Astrology”.
root.details: Depositum der BERLIN-BRANDENBURGISCHEN AKADEMIE DER WISSENSCHAFTEN in der STAATSBIBLIOTHEK ZU BERLIN - Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Orientabteilung.
